text: â€œNdipo Allah waponyanso fanizo la anthu (ena) awiri: Mmodzi ndi bubu (wosatha kuyankhula), alibe mphamvu pa chilichonse; ndipo iye ndi mtolo wolemetsa chabe bwana wake; kulikonse kumene wamulunjikitsa, sabwerako ndi chabwino (chifukwa cha umbutuma wake). Kodi iye angafanane ndi yemwe akulamula mwa chilungamo, yemwenso ali pa njira yolunjika
